00001 // Mutex.cpp: implementation of the CMutex class.
00002 //
00004 
00005 
00006 #include <System/ReentrantMutex.h>
00007 #include <System/SimpleException.h>
00008 #include <System/Thread.h>
00009 
00010 using namespace Omiscid;
00011 
00013 // Construction/Destruction
00015 
00016 ReentrantMutex::ReentrantMutex()
00017 {
00018 #ifdef WIN32
00019     mutex = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL );
00020 #else
00021     pthread_mutexattr_t attr; 
00023     pthread_mutexattr_init (&attr);
00024     pthread_mutexattr_settype (&attr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE);
00025 
00026     if ( pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, &attr) != 0 )
00027     {
00028         throw  SimpleException("Error Mutex Init");
00029     }
00030 #endif
00031 #ifdef DEBUG
00032     OwnerId = 0;
00033 #endif
00034 }
00035 
00036 ReentrantMutex::~ReentrantMutex()
00037 {
00038 #ifdef WIN32
00039     if ( mutex )
00040     {
00041         CloseHandle( mutex );
00042     }
00043 #else
00044     pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00045 #endif
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool ReentrantMutex::Lock()
00049 {
00050 #ifdef WIN32
00051     unsigned int Result = WaitForSingleObject( mutex, INFINITE );
00052     if ( Result == WAIT_OBJECT_0 )
00053     {
00054 #ifdef DEBUG
00055         // In debug mode, set the owner id
00056         OwnerId = Thread::GetThreadId();
00057 #endif
00058         // Here we go, we've got the mutex
00059         return true;
00060     }
00061 #else
00062     if( pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex) == 0 )
00063     {
00064 #ifdef DEBUG
00065         // In debug mode, set the owner id
00066         OwnerId = Thread::GetThreadId();
00067 #endif
00068         return true;
00069     }
00070 #endif
00071 
00072     return false;
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool ReentrantMutex::Unlock()
00076 {
00077 #ifdef WIN32
00078     if ( !ReleaseMutex(mutex) )
00079     {
00080         return false;
00081     }
00082 #else
00083     if( pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex) != 0 )
00084     {
00085         return false;
00086     }
00087 #endif
00088 #ifdef DEBUG
00089     OwnerId = 0;
00090 #endif
00091 
00092     return true;
00093 }
